subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Riley Skinner found a perfect way to obliterate the miserable memory of his painful performance against Navy earlier this season. Skinner went 11 for 11 and threw the go-ahead touchdown pass to Ben Wooster with 7 minutes 52 seconds left, leading Wake Forest to a 29-19 comeback victory over the Midshipmen in the inaugural EagleBank Bowl to open the bowl season Saturday.
